programmes.show_description: Wham bam glam craziness with The Emperor spreading love from LA! We've teamed up with NOW70s to bring you 3 years of music 1971-1974 that defined a decade & forged fabulous fashion.
These are the legendary rock stars that made the 80s! Expect Meat Loaf, Bonnie Tyler, Queen, Bon Jovi, AC/DC, Iron Maiden & loads more!
An hour of rockin' chart toppers from the 80s featuring big hits from Blondie, Berlin, Pink Floyd & U2!
Over the years their credibility has been questioned, but their singalong potential was never in doubt! These are the 80s songs that built cities out of Rock'n'Roll!
These are the legendary rock stars that made the 80s! Expect Meat Loaf, Bonnie Tyler, Queen, Bon Jovi, AC/DC, Iron Maiden & loads more!
Spanning two decades, an hour of Anthems and the biggest rock songs from rock legends Fleetwood Mac!
From our sister channel NOW 80s T'Pau's Carol Decker brings a bit of Heart & Soul to a countdown of 80s ladies who liked to rock! With Joan Jett, Stevie Nicks & Pat Benatar.
Turn it up to 11 for the finest rock anthems! Featuring Kings Of Leon, The Killers, Green Day, Biffy Clyro & The Foo Fighters. This is Now Rock!
An hour of Nu Metal from the likes of Alien Ant Farm, Evanescence and Limp Bizkit to Korn, Linkin Park and Rage Against The Machine.
Dust off your old posters as Alex relives 30 era-defining mega bangers that made high school legendary! Featuring Evanescence, No Doubt, Limp Bizkit, Wheatus & many more!
A decade of mega hits and the loudest anthems! Expect Biffy Clyro, Linkin Park, Blink 182, Evanescence, Fall Out Boy & loads more!
Starting in 2007 - 45 minutes of the biggest rock songs from Paramore!
The Biggest Ballads from the royals of rock! From Queen, Bon Jovi & Whitesnake to Meat Loaf, Nickleback & Evanescence.
In reverse: Starting in 2015, we're going back 35 years with timeless, soft rock tracks & big power ballads!
The Biggest Ballads from the royals of rock! From Queen, Bon Jovi & Whitesnake to Meat Loaf, Nickleback & Evanescence.
A musical journey through sixty years of the finest American rock n' roll. From Elvis & Jerry Lee Lewis to Nirvana & Green Day.
The biggest rock anthems from across the pond featuring Green Day, The Foo Fighters, Bon Jovi, Aerosmith, Pink, Blondie and many more.
We open the high school year book with Weezer in 1995 and remember the amazing bands that rocked every school party through to 2005!
A definitive selection of rock and indie anthems from the 2010s! Starting with My Chemical Romance in 2010 right through to Liam Gallagher at the end of the decade.
Bruno Brookes with the biggest UK rock tracks of the 90s. Expect a decent slice of Stereophonics, Bon Jovi, Nirvana and RHCP. But you might be surprised at the No.1!
Turn it up to 11 for the finest rock anthems! Featuring Kings Of Leon, The Killers, Green Day, Biffy Clyro & The Foo Fighters. This is Now Rock!
4 hours of rock anthems that all hit the top 5 in the first decade of this century. From Blink 182 in 2000 to Kasabian in 2009.
Nicky brings a masterclass in the most popular (& dangerous) subject in rock history! 20 songs loaded with lust, desire, breakups & despair - this is how love really does bite!
The Biggest Ballads from the royals of rock! From Queen, Bon Jovi & Whitesnake to Meat Loaf, Nickleback & Evanescence.
An hour of Anthems and the biggest rock songs spanning over 20 years from rock legends Aerosmith!
A 90s evolution of Rock: From the raw energy of glam and the grunge to the alt rock revolution. Expect to see Def Leppard, Guns N Roses, Alanis, No Doubt and many more!
